```{python}
#| include: false

import tomllib

with open("pyproject.toml", "rb") as f:
    pyproject = tomllib.load(f)

authors = pyproject.get("project").get("authors")
project = pyproject.get("project").get("name")
version = pyproject.get("project").get("version")
```
